name: harperdb
description: HarperDB no-SQL SQL database written in node.js

scripts.build: eslint -c ./.eslintbuild bin/ data_layer/ events/ security/ server/ sqlTranslator/ upgrade/ utility/ validation/
scripts.pretty: eslint --fix bin/ data_layer/ events/ security/ server/ sqlTranslator/ upgrade/ utility/ validation/
scripts.test: rm -rf ./.nyc_output/* && npm run build && node utility/devops/register.js --reset_license --storage_type=lmdb && npm run cover:main && npm run cover:lmdbbridge && npm run cover:lmdbutility && npm run cover:hdbserver && npm run cover:cfserver && nyc merge .nyc_output coverage.json && node ./utility/devops/register.js --reset_license --storage_type=lmdb
scripts.cover:cfserver: npm run submodules && cd bin/ && nyc --no-clean --reporter=lcov ../node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha '../unitTests/server/customFunctions/customFunctionsServer-test.js' --parallel --config '../unitTests/.mocharc.json'
scripts.test:ci: cd bin/ && ../node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha '../unitTests/**/*.js' --retries 3 --config '../unitTests/.mocharc-main.json' --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter && ../node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha '../unitTests/data_layer/harperBridge/lmdbBridge/**/*.js' --parallel --retries 3 --config '../unitTests/.mocharc.json' --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter && ../node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha '../unitTests/utility/lmdb/**/*.js' --parallel --retries 3 --config '../unitTests/.mocharc.json' --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter && ../node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha '../unitTests/server/harperdb/hdbServer-test.js' --parallel --retries 3 --config '../unitTests/.mocharc.json' --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter && ../node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha '../unitTests/server/customFunctions/customFunctionsServer-test.js' --parallel --retries 3 --config '../unitTests/.mocharc.json' --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter
scripts.integrationtests:source: node utility/devops/register.js --reset_license --storage_type=lmdb && cd ./bin && node harperdb restart && sleep 10 && cd ../integrationTests && ../node_modules/newman/bin/newman.js run HarperDB_Integration_Tests.json -e ./Int_test_env_var.json --reporters teamcity,cli,html,htmlextra --reporter-html-export newman/report.html --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/extra_report.html --insecure
scripts.integrationtests:package: node utility/devops/register.js --reset_license --storage_type=lmdb && cd ./npm_pack/bin && node harperdb restart && sleep 2 && cd ../../integrationTests && ../node_modules/newman/bin/newman.js run HarperDB_Integration_Tests.json -e ./Int_test_env_var.json --reporters teamcity,cli,html,htmlextra --reporter-html-export newman/report.html --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/extra_report.html --insecure
